data.message: kindly send me the complete use of facebook messenger especially sending pics sending procedure

replies.message: Hey, Muhammad. You can send a message by tapping the pencil icon, selecting a contact, writing your message and clicking send. For more information, visit: http://bit.ly/2bPjPXD. While you're viewing any conversation, you can use the options on the bottom of the screen to send photos or videos, take and send new photos, record a voice message and add stickers. Learn how: http://bit.ly/2bJwiyh. -Monica
